description:
Based in Jacksonville, North Carolina, the King Law Firm provides unmatched representation to individuals and families suffering needlessly due to the negligent, reckless or unlawful acts of others. Backed by our more than 30 years of combined legal experience, the attorneys at our law firm have the extensive skills and resources to handle your matter efficiently. We have on our staff attorneys who are board-certified workers' compensation specialists, so you can trust you will receive the latest, most relevant counsel possible for your legal issue.

Along with handling all types of personal injury, wrongful death, workers' compensation and Social Security Disability claims, including Defense Base Act legal claims, our attorneys also provide exceptional representation in bankruptcy, estate planning, criminal defense and family law. No matter the legal issues affecting you and your loved ones, you can turn to us for aggressive advocacy and dedicated support to help increase your chances of obtaining the favorable outcome you expect and deserve.

Through our personal injury practice, we have recovered more than $50 million in total compensation for our plaintiff clients, and we will not require a fee unless we win your case. We are also available 24/7 to address your questions and concerns as they arise. What's more, our law firm has grown to include 10 total offices throughout the state, so you are never far away from the personalized counsel and effective representation you need.

To find out more about how we can best assist you with your serious and pressing legal challenge, you can contact the King Law Firm by phone or through our website to schedule a free initial consultation.

We are a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the Bankruptcy Code.
